questions.question: What will be improved to develop the marine tourism industry?
questions.answer: The necessary infrastructure.

questions.question: Which airports will be developed over the next 15 years?
questions.answer: Katunayaka, Mattala, Jafna, Ratmalana, and other airports.

questions.question: What sea ports will be developed over the next 15 years?
questions.answer: Colombo, Hambantota, and Trincomalee sea ports.

questions.question: How many passengers per year are the sea ports expected to service?
questions.answer: 80 million passengers.

questions.question: What will be improved in the transport system?
questions.answer: It will be improved to international standards, including high-quality sanitary facilities.

questions.question: What will be done to old buses?
questions.answer: New licenses and credit facilities will be provided to phase out old buses and import modern, comfortable buses.

questions.question: What will happen to the licenses of errant bus drivers?
questions.answer: Their licenses will be suspended.

questions.question: What is required for new bus licenses?
questions.answer: Proper counselling, driving training, and testing.

questions.question: How will the productivity of existing railways be improved?
questions.answer: By deploying new trains.

questions.question: How will the train timetable and ticketing process be managed?
questions.answer: Through the ICT system.

questions.question: What will be expanded by connecting the seaports around the island?
questions.answer: Passenger and cargo transportation services.

questions.question: What will be developed to support international maritime transport?
questions.answer: International maritime transport and service centers.

questions.question: What will investments be made in for housing construction?
questions.answer: Safe housing for every citizen.

questions.question: What will be prioritized in town and village planning?
questions.answer: The planning of towns and villages, and the design and construction of new towns, offices, and factories.

questions.question: What is the aim of investments in energy needs?
questions.answer: To meet energy needs from renewable sources to reduce fuel imports and environmental pollution.

questions.question: What will be implemented to continuously meet drinking water needs?
questions.answer: A comprehensive program.

questions.question: What will be developed to support youth with education, training, and ICT services?
questions.answer: New ICT clusters.

questions.question: What will happen to internet connectivity tariffs?
questions.answer: They will be revised as an essential service.

questions.question: How will public services be made easier and faster?
questions.answer: By installing the Electronic National Identity Card System with biometric data.

questions.question: What will be implemented across all public services to reduce time wastage and cost?
questions.answer: An integrated ICT system.

questions.question: What kind of system will be set up to manage public service performance?
questions.answer: An ICT-based Public Service Performance Management System.

questions.question: What will be established with international stakeholders and investors?
questions.answer: A policy and practical program to utilize capabilities to produce modern technology products for the global market.

questions.question: How will small and medium-sized technology manufacturing industries be supported?
questions.answer: By linking them to create regional manufacturing clusters and providing necessary technology, investment, and global market access.

questions.question: What is the purpose of developing the marine tourism industry?
questions.answer: To enhance marine tourism by improving the necessary infrastructure.

questions.question: How many major airports will be developed?
questions.answer: Several major airports, including Katunayaka, Mattala, Jafna, and Ratmalana.

questions.question: What will new ICT clusters provide for the youth?
questions.answer: Education, training, and ICT service access.

questions.question: Why will internet connectivity tariffs be revised?
questions.answer: To ensure internet is considered an essential service.

questions.question: What is the goal of the Electronic National Identity Card System?
questions.answer: Making public services easier and faster.
